docs.snippet: The United Nations General Assembly rejected yesterday the United States plan for a temporary trusteeship regime in Jerusalem.
docs.lead_paragraph: The United Nations General Assembly rejected yesterday the United States plan for a temporary trusteeship regime in Jerusalem.

headline.main: U.N. Bars Jerusalem Trusteeship; Vote Follows Mandate Deadline; U.N. BARS TRUST FOR JERUSALEM

docs.snippet: After hearing both the Soviet Union and the Arab delegates denounce the United States for its sudden recognition of the new Jewish state in Palestine, the United Nations General Assembly decided last night to send a Mediator to the Holy Land to do...
docs.lead_paragraph: After hearing both the Soviet Union and the Arab delegates denounce the United States for its sudden recognition of the new Jewish state in Palestine, the United Nations General Assembly decided last night to send a Mediator to the Holy Land to do what he could to arrange a truce and carry on public services.

headline.main: U. N. Votes for a Mediator; Special Assembly Is Ended; U. N. FOR MEDIATOR; ASSEMBLY IS ENDED

docs.snippet: A CONSIDERABLE portion of the passenger space available to sea travelers under the American flag represents tonnage normally considered by naval architects and marine engineers to be obsolescent. But the post-war reconversion orders, under which...
docs.lead_paragraph: A CONSIDERABLE portion of the passenger space available to sea travelers under the American flag represents tonnage normally considered by naval architects and marine engineers to be obsolescent. But the post-war reconversion orders, under which war-weary ships have been brought back to pleasure-travel standards, have been so thorough, and incidentally so costly, that in the majority of cases the customer would have a hard time telling the vessels from new ships.

headline.main: LINER BRAZIL A NEW LADY; Rebuilt and Redecorated At Cost of 9 Millions

docs.snippet: SOUTH AMERICA is so big and exciting that the choice of where to go and what to see and do can overwhelm even a veteran tourist. Our six-month combination business and pleasure trip through most of the South American countries was too long and too...
docs.lead_paragraph: SOUTH AMERICA is so big and exciting that the choice of where to go and what to see and do can overwhelm even a veteran tourist. Our six-month combination business and pleasure trip through most of the South American countries was too long and too busy to be recommended for other pleasure travelers.

headline.main: DOING SOUTH AMERICA; Brief Itinerary to View A Big Continent
$11,000,000 FOR CHILDREN; Eleven Countries in U.N. Drive Give Early Reports

byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES

docs.snippet: PORT-OF-SPAIN -- Down at the end of the long arc of the West Indies, Trinidad is a transportation crossroads and the busiest port in the Antilles. It is getting busier now that the cruise ships are coming back.
docs.lead_paragraph: PORT-OF-SPAIN -- Down at the end of the long arc of the West Indies, Trinidad is a transportation crossroads and the busiest port in the Antilles. It is getting busier now that the cruise ships are coming back.

headline.main: TRINIDAD COSMOS; Tropical Isle Is Also a World Crossroads

docs.snippet: I read with great interest the article of your chief South American correspondent, Milton Bracker, which appeared in your May 3 issue. Mr. Bracker generally states that the constitutions and laws of the Latin-American nations lack guarantees with...
docs.lead_paragraph: I read with great interest the article of your chief South American correspondent, Milton Bracker, which appeared in your May 3 issue. Mr. Bracker generally states that the constitutions and laws of the Latin-American nations lack guarantees with regard to expropriations.
docs.abstract: Min Mora lr on property rights; cites expropriation laws

headline.main: Property Rights in Uruguay; Laws of Country Said to Assure Protection Against Confiscation

docs.snippet: Foreign exchanges had opened last week quietly and with the same degree of evenness apparent in the preceding fortnight when it was greeted in Tuesday's session with the report of the United States Advisory Council that modification of exchange...
docs.lead_paragraph: Foreign exchanges had opened last week quietly and with the same degree of evenness apparent in the preceding fortnight when it was greeted in Tuesday's session with the report of the United States Advisory Council that modification of exchange values should be a requirement of ERP aid.

headline.main: PERON SHUFFLES ENVOYS; Half of Argentine Embassy Heads of Hemisphere Are Shifted
